title: India's Hindalco plans to enter solar module manufacturing, sources say
description: Hindalco Industries, part of the Aditya Birla Group, plans to enter solar module manufacturing with a new plant in Gujarat. The company is currently evaluating a five-year plan and has identified land in Mundra. This move aligns with India's goal to expand renewable energy capacity by 2030.
